title: Fire and Ice
description: Kynaston Germaine knows that Bryn is the last woman he'll fall for. Apart from her beautiful eyes, what does she have going for her? For her part, Bryn hates the handsome man who has destroyed everything that made her happy. Then fate intervenes and Kyn finds himself fathoms deep in love with the mysterious Bryony Rose, but Bryony seems to be the one woman who is immune to the irresistible Germaine charm...
author: Maxine Barry
